Tonight is great and we must accept what was destined to be this night, tonight is great and there are no hearts to scar other hearts on this night
I closed my eyes (oh baby) and dreamt of you and I woke and here I am (oh baby) with my hands in yours
And I swore, oh passion, from her I will not repent

You've been absent and my soul is still longing for you
Don't you want to see me anymore?
